text: Fabien Roy (April 17, 1928 â€“ October 31, 2023) is a Canadian politician. Roy was elected to the National Assembly of Quebec and the House of Commons of Canada in 1979 and left office in 1980. He was a supporter of social credit theories of monetary reform. Roy was a member and Leader of the Social Credit Party of Canada. He was born in Saint-Prosper, Quebec.Patrimoine-Beauceville - Fabien Roy Fabien Roy died in Saint-Georges, Quebec, on October 31, 2023, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Politicians from Quebec
title: Fabien Roy
